item.title: Vim help index
item.description: A very strong point of vim is its documentation. There’s just so much of it!! So, use it It doesn’t matter if you’re an experienced user of vim or a complete beginner, there’ll be something in there for you to learn for sure. Where could you start? Well, at the index of course! Just type :help and hit enter and scroll down a bit. See that? You got a few kind of “tutorials” (I especially like the one Clever tricks).
